comments.text:
+Dhavia Rachmanita Aziz Well, here's how to tell the differences between 
the two:
1. Baily has a rounder face;Brooklyn has a "smaller" face 
2. Brooklyn has longer hair 
3. Bailey is either wearing no earrings or hoops or long earrings; Brooklyn 
is always wearing diamonds or stud earrings. 
4. Its called Brooklyn and Bailey so usually it is in that order every 
video, or the other way around:)
5. Brooklyn is a Tom boy or "Tom girl" So she will were more loose cloths 
and Bailey will wear more GIRLY or feminine cloths? (Sorry I don't know 
what that means XD)
YOUR WELCOME:)

captions.text:
And this week we are going to
show you guys a special video.

We noticed that our two room
tours have been pretty popular.

So we thought we'd dig
back like 10 years--

-Like family videos
and stuff, and we
found our very first room tour.

And it was when we bought--
like my parents had just

bought our very first house
and we just got our own room.

And this is, mind
you, when we're four.

And we just got our
own room to share,

and you're going to see
her reaction to when

she sees the room
for the first time.

-And then you're going to
see a reaction to our room

after it's decorated,
and my mom and dad
decked it all out for us both.

-So let's get
started and watch it.

Quilts, and then
stuff that I made.

Right of their
horse, their blocks.

What's the rule when
you're in mommy's bed?

If you're going to climb on,
you have to push the quilt--

-Any present comes with
a warning from Mom.

Guess who the pillow
shams are from?
She gave you the big pillow.

I mean Bailey at one point
was like, "This room isn't

You were like walking-- you're
like, "This is so cool!"

And then you run into the
closet and hang on the hanger.

You're like, "This is
my swinging hanger."

-And then I-- we
ran to the window,

and then I was like,
"It's a basketball hoop!"

It was like little
chipmunk voices.
And it's like-- all the time.

It's weird seeing
myself when I was four

because I don't remember
ever talking like that.

And watching the
video, I remember

the decorations and
stuff like that.

I remember the beds
and that mirror.

-I remember all of that, and I
remember how much I loved it.

-We would crawl up on
our little bedstand

and sit there and make
faces in the mirror.
I remember that all the time.

Anyways, don't forget to follow
us on Twitter @BrookAndBailey.

Also, don't forget
to leave a comment

below on if you like seeing
us in these old home videos

And we will see
you guys next week.

title: Brooklyn & Bailey's Toddler Girl Room Tour {2003}
